long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Side Reader can open a PDF reader beside ChatGPT. You can read a PDF while chatting with ChatGPT. After selecting words in the PDF, a button list will pop up. You can translate or explain the selected words by clicking the buttons without the need for frequent pasting and copying.

You can regard Side Reader as an alternative for PDF.ai and ChatPDF.

Buttons of toolbar:
- Translate
- Explain
- Summarize
- Copy
- Copy to Input

Change Log: https://quaint-perfume-a73.notion.site/Change-Log-12e2c842fe03803d99c7d5a7de633baf
